attributes.action: Caught on a phone once?lose your licence!
attributes.additional_details:
Motorists need to start taking the dangers of using a mobile phone while driving seriously.

At the moment if you get caught once you get a few points.

This is not effective enough as theres a slim chance of them being caught a second time.

Why do they need a second chance?it only takes one chance to kill somebody and then its to late.
Every day people and drivers are killed because of a driver being on the phone instead of oaying attention at what is becoming over crowded roads.

All it takes is a distraction of one phone call to kill a loved one.

If you lose your licence un one attempt then hopefully itl make drivers think twice before they get tempted to make that "quick phone call"that will end somebodys life.

Please please please sign this.
